titleStmt.title: The two speeches of the Lord Wharton, spoken in Guild-Hall, Octob. 27. 1642. In which are contained a full and true relation of the battell betweene the two armies at Kinton. Corrected by the authors owne hand.
titleStmt.author: Wharton, Philip Wharton, Baron, 1613-1696.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
